description.name: pyusdarbitrum
description.tagline: PYUSD arbitrum Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto arbitrum-pyusd Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept PYUSD arbitrum directly on your website
Unique arbitrum/pyusd receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your arbitrum/pyusd wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
